description: Reborn is the holder of the Yellow pacifier. The titular character, Reborn is an infant hitman belonging to the Vongola Family. As the Vongola IX`s most trusted member, he becomes Tsuna`s home tutor and trains him into becoming a mob boss. Since he is an official Vongola member and is only there to train Tsuna, he is not allowed to directly interfere with most of Tsuna`s battles, though he is allowed to defend against attacks directed solely at him.
name: Reborn
